title: A Man of Vision
description: Meet Louis Braille, the person who invented a system for blind people to read and write. This informational book provides readers with insight into Louis Braille's life from the year of his birth to the accident that caused his blindness and the year of his death. Illustrations support readers' understanding of this historical biography.
meta: awl, blind, night writing, obstacle, sew, slate, stylus, symbol, touch system
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions while reading

Reading Numbers within Text : Fluently read numbers within text
